councillor.keyposts: Lead Member: Children's Social Care and Health
Opposition Spokesperson: Children's Social Care and Health
Opposition Spokesperson: Adult Social Care and Health
Chair of South of the Borough Neighbourhood Committee
Lead Member: Treasury; Chair of Audit, Governance and Standards
Portfolio Holder: Children's Social Care and Health
Deputy Leader of the Council & Portfolio Holder: Partnerships

surgerydetails.line1: I hold a drop in surgery with my Coombe Vale ward colleagues on the second Saturday of each month with the exception of August and December. It is held at Dickerage Sports and Community Centre, Dickerage Lane, New Malden between 10am and 12 noon.

councillor.keyposts: Portfolio Holder: Adults Social Care and Health

surgerydetails.line1: Councillor Cottington holds a surgery every second Saturday of the month, except for December and August, from 10am to 12 noon at Piper Hall Community Centre.
Councillor Griffin holds a surgery every second Saturday of the month, except for December and August, from 10am to 12 noon at Piper Hall Community Centre.
Councillor David Fraser holds a surgery on the first Sat. in the month from 10 - 12 noon at the Old Malden Library

councillor.keyposts: Leader of the Opposition, Opposition Spokesperson: Resident Participation
Vice Chair South of the Borough Neighbourhood Committee

surgerydetails.line1: The Tudor Ward Councillors hold a surgery every second Saturday in the month at Tudor Hall, Tudor Drive between 10 a.m & noon. No appointment needed.

councillor.keyposts: Lead Member: Adults Social Care and Health
Chair of Kingston Town Neighbourhood Committee
